original_text: For those who live according to the flesh set their minds on the things of the flesh, but those who live according to the Spirit set their minds on the things of the Spirit.
korean_text: 육신을 따르는 자는 육신의 일을, 영을 따르는 자는 영의 일을 생각하나니

sentences.original_text: For those who live according to the flesh
set their minds on the things of the flesh
but those who live according to the Spirit
set their minds on the things of the Spirit.
